headline.main: Russia's Lavrov Says No Breakthrough Reached at Minsk Talks on Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Russia's Lavrov Says No Breakthrough Reached at Minsk Talks on Ukraine

docs.snippet: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said there had been no breakthrough in talks on Tuesday on the peace process in eastern Ukraine because the foreign ministers from Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany could not agree on a roadmap....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said there had been no breakthrough in talks on Tuesday on the peace process in eastern Ukraine because the foreign ministers from Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany could not agree on a roadmap.

headline.main: Factbox: Trump Fills Top Jobs for His Administration

docs.snippet: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is expected to name former Goldman Sachs partner and Hollywood financier Steven Mnuchin as his nominee for Treasury secretary and billionaire investor Wilbur Ross to head the Commerce Department, according to Repu...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is expected to name former Goldman Sachs partner and Hollywood financier Steven Mnuchin as his nominee for Treasury secretary and billionaire investor Wilbur Ross to head the Commerce Department, according to Republican sources.

headline.main: Drug-Resistant Salmonella Linked to Wisconsin Calves
headline.print_headline: Drug-Resistant Salmonella Linked to Wisconsin Calves

docs.snippet: A multistate outbreak of salmonella bacteria that is resistant to several drugs has been linked to infected dairy bull calves purchased in Wisconsin, according to federal and state health officials....
docs.lead_paragraph: A multistate outbreak of salmonella bacteria that is resistant to several drugs has been linked to infected dairy bull calves purchased in Wisconsin, according to federal and state health officials.

headline.main: Groups Document More Than 860 Hate Incidents Since Elections
headline.print_headline: Groups Document More Than 860 Hate Incidents Since Elections

docs.snippet: Civil rights groups called for President-elect Donald Trump to forcefully and publicly denounce racism and bigotry, pointing to more than 860 bias-related incidents recorded in the 10 days following his Nov. 8 victory....

headline.main: Giant Arch, a Feat of Engineering, Now Covers Chernobyl Site in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Giant Protective Arch Now Covers Chernobyl

docs.snippet: The shelter, under construction since 2010, covers the deteriorating steel and concrete sarcophagus hastily built after the nuclear accident 30 years ago....

byline.contributor: Ivan Nechepurenko reported from Moscow, and Henry Fountain from New York.
byline.original: By IVAN NECHEPURENKO and HENRY FOUNTAIN
